actionConfiguration.body:
select aa.school_id,aa.class_id,aa.chapter_tag,aa.section_id,aa.subject_id,aa.test_id,aa.test_name,aa.chapter_name,aa.learnyst_link,
aa.start_date, aa.end_date, aa.test_url ,aa.total_questions_count, aa.questions_requested, 
aa.sel_ques from
		(select sci.school_id,sm.class_id, cdm.subject_id,td.chapter_tag, sm.section_id,td.test_id, td.test_name, cdm.chapter_name,
to_char(timezone('Asia/Kolkata',ctt.start_date),'dd/mm/yyyy HH12:MI am') start_date, 
to_char(timezone('Asia/Kolkata',ctt.end_date),'dd/mm/yyyy HH12:MI am') end_date, 
ctt.test_url ,count(*) as total_questions_count, td.questions_requested, 
count(distinct qd.lb_question_tag) as sel_ques, concat('https://learnbasics.learnyst.com/admin/products/course-builder/',cd.ly_course_id) as learnyst_link
		

from public.test_details as td
left join content.ly_question_details as qd on td.test_name = qd.test_name
	and td.chapter_tag = qd.chapter_tag
	and td.test_id = qd.test_id
join public.course_test_track as ctt
	on td.test_id = ctt.test_id
join public.chapter_details_master as cdm
	on td.chapter_tag = cdm.chapter_tag
join  public.section_master as sm
	on ctt.section_id = sm.section_id
join public.school_class_info as sci
	on sm.class_id= sci.class_id
join public.subject_master as submas
	on cdm.subject_id = submas.subject_id
join app.ly_course_data as cd
	on ctt.section_id =any(cd.section_id_list)
where td.deadline = {{test_date.selectedDate}}
group by sci.school_id,sm.class_id,cdm.subject_id,td.chapter_tag,sm.section_id,td.test_id,  td.test_name, td.chapter_tag, cdm.chapter_name, 
 		ctt.start_date, ctt.end_date, ctt.test_url, td.questions_requested,cd.ly_course_id
		order by sci.school_id,sm.class_id,td.chapter_tag,sm.section_id,td.test_name)aa 
--where school_id={{school.selectedOptionValue}} and  subject_id ={{subject.selectedOptionValue}}
